info.title: Australian Football League (AFL) API
info.description: An API to get AFL data from multiple data sources.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: The season number in year format YYYY

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Data source provider - Note, only AFL source has AFLW fixture data
